com.wuest.prefab.Base

Class TileBlockBase<T extends TileEntityBase>

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.minecraftforge.fml.common.registry.IForgeRegistryEntry.Impl<net.minecraft.block.Block>
      • net.minecraft.block.Block
        • com.wuest.prefab.Base.TileBlockBase<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    net.minecraft.block.ITileEntityProvider, net.minecraftforge.fml.common.registry.IForgeRegistryEntry<net.minecraft.block.Block>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BlockDrafter

    public abstract class TileBlockBase<T extends TileEntityBase>
extends net.minecraft.block.Block
implements net.minecraft.block.ITileEntityProvider
    The base block for any block associated with a tile entity.
    Author:
    WuestMan

        pos - Block position in world

        Returns:

      • getLocalTileEntity

        public T getLocalTileEntity(net.minecraft.world.World worldIn,
                            net.minecraft.util.math.BlockPos pos)
        Gets the tile entity at the current position.
        Parameters:
        worldIn - The world to the entity for.
        pos - The position in the world to get the entity for.
        Returns:
        Null if the tile was not found or if one was found and is not a proper tile entity. Otherwise the tile entity instance.

      • customUpdateState

        public abstract int customUpdateState(net.minecraft.world.World worldIn,
                                      net.minecraft.util.math.BlockPos pos,
                                      net.minecraft.block.state.IBlockState state,
                                      T tileEntity)
        Processes custom update state.
        Parameters:
        worldIn - The world this state is being updated in.
        pos - The block position.
        state - The block state.
        tileEntity - The tile entity associated with this class.
        Returns:
        The number of ticks to delay until the next update.
